entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
